content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a case in the district court in ljubljana the case involves the payment of costs and started on april 25 2017 ending on september 11 2017 the final resolution of the lawsuit involves the division of various assets between the exspouses including an apartment a parking spot another property a share in a company two bmw cars equipment and savings the plaintiff will receive 55000 eur and half of the real estate properties while the defendant will pay 55000 eur to the plaintiff and also receive half of the real estate properties the decision was based on a specific law called the civil procedure act and the court settlement is confidential
